title: Bug 14500NPE due to ResourceWorkingSetFilter
OB: The private method isEnclosed() gets called from API method select(...). Thishappens when an element is added to a list/table. Unfortunately isEnclosed()accesses a field which is null. The field is only != null during the filter(...)call.Test Case:1.
SR: Set a working set on a window2. Add a new package in the Java Browsing perspective.
